availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Dover, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Miranda Young Adams in Bath County, Kentucky on May 14, 1838. Father of William, Julia, Hesperia, and Mary Adams. Wagoner drayman in Mason County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Dover, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, District 1, p. 22B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Dover, 3rd District, p. 54.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, Dover, p. 311A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000273004
